remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，這個屬性是 類別的索引子。In C#, this property is the indexer for the class. 在 JScript 中，您可以使用類型，所定義的預設索引屬性，但您無法明確地定義您自己。In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own. 不過，指定 expando 屬性類別上的會自動提供預設值編製索引的索引類型的物件類型與屬性。However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property with a type of Object and an index type of .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果對 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會傳回物件，該物件可用來同步處理對 的存取。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 中的大部分集合類別命名空間也會實作已同步處理方法，可提供的同步處理基礎集合周圍的包裝函式。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉期間的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截的例外狀況所導致的其他執行緒所做的變更。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions that result from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下列範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間：The following example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 取得可用來同步存取 的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用來同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於那些無法公開使用基礎存放區的集合而言，所預期的實作會傳回目前的執行個體。For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance. 請注意，目前的執行個體的指標可能無法完全包裝其他集合; 的集合這些集合應該傳回基礎集合的 SyncRoot 屬性。Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's SyncRoot property. 中的大部分集合類別命名空間也會實作已同步處理方法，可提供的同步處理基礎集合周圍的包裝函式。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 然而，衍生類別 (Derived Class) 可以使用 屬性，提供它們自己集合的同步化版本。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的集合，不會直接在集合上。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the collection, not directly on the collection. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 特別是可以與其他可能同時修改集合執行個體的執行緒，保持正常的同步處理。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance. 集合，如預期的使用中的已同步處理方法沒有看起來像這樣：In the absence of a Synchronized method on a collection, the expected usage for looks like this: ```csharp ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` 透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用屬性來設定索引鍵的值加入新項目不存在於字典 (比方說， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`). 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已經存在字典中，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何實作 方法。The following example shows how to implement the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IDictionary.IsFixedSize

summary.span: 取得代表 物件是否具有固定大小的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 物件有固定大小，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the object has a fixed size; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許新增或移除項目集合會建立，但不允許修改現有的項目之後。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but does allow the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小集合是唯讀的集合只會防止新增和移除項目; 的包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作屬性。The following example demonstrates how to implement the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Dictionary#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/cpp/Dictionary.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[Dictionary#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/CS/Dictionary.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Dictionary#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dictionary/VB/Dictionary.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作屬性。The following example shows how to implement the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[key]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 您也可以使用屬性來設定索引鍵的值加入新項目不存在於字典 (比方說， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`). 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已經存在字典中，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作屬性。The following example shows how to implement the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: Returns an object.
An .object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，使用`foreach`建議而不要直接操作列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置，未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Values { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個集合中的屬性值。

span.span: Gets the values of the properties in this collection.
An that contains the values of the properties in this collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取的成員時屬性，例外狀況可能會擲回由於發生錯誤時存取基礎的介面。When accessing members of the property, a exception might be thrown due to an error while accessing the underlying interface.
